This page covers biological details of component Dorsal Anterior Cingulate Area.
Region is part of aHuman target integrated biological model.

  * *Top-down path to region*: Cortex -> Anterior Lobe (NC.LOBE.ANT) -> Anterior Cingulate Area (NC.ACG) -> Anterior Cingulate Cortex (NC.AL.ACG) -> Dorsal Anterior Cingulate Area (NDM.NC.AL.DACG) (see [OverallMindMaps Mind Maps])
  * *Type*: cortex
  * *Brain area*: [BrainAreaNDM Neocortical Brain - Decision Making Area]
  * *Brodmann ID*: 32
  * *Role*: processor
  * *Function*: Rational Thought Processes
  * *Notes to function*: Anticipate and detect targets, indicate novelty, influence motor responses, encode reward values, and signal errors, motor, attentional and cognitive functions; BA32-rostral
